title: Demeter Indo Holdings Pte. Ltd Transfer Transaction of PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo
body: Demeter Indo Holdings Pte. Ltd, an insider, transferred 1,370,798,546 shares of PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk, reducing its holding to 0.

title: Mahogany Global Investment Pte Ltd Sell Transaction of PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk
body: Mahogany Global Investment Pte Ltd, an insider, sold 580,500 shares of PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk, reducing its holding from 459,637,051 to 459,056,551. The transaction occurred in the energy sector, specifically alternative energy, with a share price of 450.

title: PT Abadimukti Gunalestari Sell Transaction of Perdana Gapura Prima Tbk
body: On September 29, 2025, PT Abadimukti Gunalestari, an institution shareholder, sold 81,893,900 shares of Perdana Gapura Prima Tbk, changing its holding from 2,373,100,720 to 2,335,942,520 shares.
